title: Trois Milliards Sans Ascenseur
other_title: Three Thousand Million without an elevator
description: Five friends living in a blue-collar neighborhood which is being demolished to make way for a new office and housing development band together to save their neighborhood and get rich along the way. They set up on a complicated plot involving both jewel theft and insurance fraud. Things get even more complicated when they call for the services of an expert burglar.  Credits: Producers, Andre Cohen, Marcel Sebaoun, Eugene Lepicier ; director, Roger Pigaut ; writers, Roger Pigaut, Andre G. Brunelin ; photography, Jean Tournier ; music, Teo Usuelli. Cast: Serge Reggiani, Michel Bouquet, Francoise Rosay, Bernard Fresson, Dany Carrel, Amidou, Gabriele Ferzetti, Marcel Bozzuffi, Victor Lanoux, Nike Arrighi.
